locations.name: Stacy's
locations.description: Apparel mass-produced over-seas by underpaid workers. The markup is 100x, but there's always a 25% off sale.

actions_available.try_message: You go in to shop.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a discount shirt and pants.

actions_available.try_message: You attempt to swipe some clothing.
actions_available.success_message: You tuck a shirt and pants under your shirt and pants.
actions_available.failure_message: A staff member follows you asking if you need help.

locations.name: DCK-HL
locations.description: Clothing for those that need to say they are better than you.

actions_available.try_message: You go in to shop.
actions_available.success_message: You buy fancy clothes.

actions_available.try_message: You consider misappropriating elegant attire.
actions_available.success_message: You walk out a bulkier, fancier person.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff seemed to feel you belonged elsewhere.

locations.name: Mama's Baked Sweets
locations.description: A local bakery that appears to be run by a family.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the bakery.
actions_available.success_message: You buy Mama's delicious baked bread.

actions_available.try_message: You beg for food at the bakery.
actions_available.success_message: The staff take some pity on you and offer day old bread.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff say they don't have anything to give you.

actions_available.try_message: You try lifting some baked goods.
actions_available.success_message: The staff grimaced as they watched you walk out with food.
actions_available.failure_message: A lady behind the counter started screaching and pointing at you! You put the items back and hid.

actions_available.try_message: You check the bakery's trash bins.
actions_available.success_message: You find day old bread and baked goods.
actions_available.failure_message: A lady comes out to scold you for scaring staff and customers.

locations.name: MagMart
locations.description: Aisles upon aisles of soul-less products. Tons of staff working the soul-less jobs.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: You buy over-processed food.

actions_available.try_message: You try begging for food in front of the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: Some people take pity and skim off extra food from their excess.
actions_available.failure_message: People are reluctant to give up their freshly purchased food.

actions_available.try_message: You try redeeming a five-finger discount.
actions_available.success_message: You easily walk out with your new stuff.
actions_available.failure_message: Even apathetic staff perked up around you. You missed a chance to swipe goods.

actions_available.try_message: You look through the bins behind the supermarket.
actions_available.success_message: You find some food and other goods still wrapped up.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff loading and unloading trucks blocked you from the trash bins.

locations.name: Foods-2-Eat
locations.description: A chain grocery store. Most of the food is over-processed junk, but the shelves get restocked regularly.

actions_available.try_message: You go to shop at the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You buy a mix of fresh food and not-really-food.

actions_available.try_message: You try asking the staff for some samples of meats and cheeses.
actions_available.success_message: You get a good helping of snacks.
actions_available.failure_message: The staff are reluctant to hand out any more free food to you.

actions_available.try_message: You try lifting some food from the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You manage to walk out with pockets stuffed with food.
actions_available.failure_message: The watchful eyes of the grocery staff prevented you from getting any food.

actions_available.try_message: You look through the bins behind the grocery store.
actions_available.success_message: You find a lot of food just recently passed the sell-by-date.
actions_available.failure_message: The manager comes out with a security guard to tell you to leave.

locations.name: Rundown Park
locations.description: This park doesn't get many visitors anymore. Some have taken up a semi-permanent residence.

actions_available.try_message: You try falling asleep on a secluded bench.
actions_available.success_message: You get some rest, though wake up a little sore.
actions_available.failure_message: A bored police officer prods you with his beating stick and makes you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You look through garbage bins for food.
actions_available.success_message: You find a couple morcels to eat.
actions_available.failure_message: A police officer hovers over you until you leave.

actions_available.try_message: You try to spread a message of hope and resistance.
actions_available.success_message: You connect with someone over their personal struggles.
actions_available.failure_message: The people are apathetic to you and your message.

actions_available.try_message: You try to organize a small spokescouncil meeting in the park.
actions_available.success_message: You organize a small meeting of like-minded people.
actions_available.failure_message: No one shows up for your meeting.
